The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is marked with a white line down the middle, indicating a divided road. On the right side of the street, there's a blue sign with white text, although the exact content of the text isn't discernible from the image. The overall scene is a typical representation of a well-maintained urban street in a city like Beijing.
